ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rubicite and SilverWing
ygData.msgSnippet: Crip is their only bard. Creediki quit and his account is occasionally played by a guildmate. I m supposed to go with them to Veeshan s Peak today, but Verix
ygData.messageBody:
Crip is their only bard. Creediki quit and his account is occasionally
played by a guildmate. I'm supposed to go with them to Veeshan's Peak today,
but Verix decided not to show up and give me my medallion piece!
Not sure exactly what the increase is over Kelin's (may have been posted on
their site), but I'll find out and post the info here.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
55th Karaoke Singer, Veeshan

>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rubicite and SilverWing
>Date: Thu, 24 Aug 2000 19:22:59 -0400

>Crip is their main bard. i heard it is 3-4% increase over a maestro lute.
>they got a second lute on a subsequent silverwing kill and it was not given
>to a bard before they secretly made all VP items no drop.
>
>Shada Iceheart, L57 Wood Elf Bard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
>
> > been reading up on the spoiler sites this morning, has anyone
> > tested the new
